data.name: Antipaint
data.detailed_description:
Community


Join our official discord server.


About the Game

Action Roguelike...at its Most Colourful

Are you a fan of action-based roguelike? What about creating wonderful pieces of art?

What if we told you Antipaint does what no roguelike has done before and mixes the two together! That's right, you can spray down waves of evil blob chromas while creating a masterpiece to tell your grandkids about. Antipaint is the paint'em up you've been waiting for.

Paint, or Slay Your Way


Antipaint offers a variety of unlockable classes. From the tanky thick brush that uses slow but powerful sweeps to the nimble thin brush with its precision attacks and nimble speed, all the classes offer a unique playing (and painting) style.

Paintacular Ultimates


Every class comes with a unique powerful ability, their ultimate ability. Erasing your enemies and absorbing their power will allow you to cover the canvas in the most spectacular, colourful, and powerful fashion.

Every Good Painter Needs Some Coffee...and Some Love


Clearing (and painting) a canvas rewards you with versatile items to customise your brush build. From faster ultimate to helpful paint buckets, these items help mix up your palette of playstyles, especially if you want to conquer the big boss chroma!

Art to Remember


After the paint has settled and the brushes are cleaned, why not take a step back and admire your masterpieces in the gallery.

data.short_description: A fast-paced paint 'em up roguelike where each level you beat becomes a masterpiece to add to your colorful collection.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
